ensemble.movement

Class MovementReasoning

  • java.lang.Object
    • ensemble.MusicalAgentComponent
      • ensemble.Reasoning
        • ensemble.movement.MovementReasoning
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LifeCycle, RouterClient

    public class MovementReasoning
extends Reasoning
    Given a set of waypoints and a time constraint to get there, this reasoning tries to walk.
    Author:
    lfthomaz
